description: Baseline metrics for evaluation harness. Updated by /eval baseline command.
note: Initial baselines are estimates. Run /eval baseline after 5+ sessions for real data.

tests_pass_rate.description: Fraction of tests passing at session end

beads_closed_per_session.description: Average beads issues closed per session

files_changed_per_session.description: Average files changed (high isn't always good)

escalation_rate.description: Escalations per session (high = system asking for too much help)

spiral_detection_rate.description: Spiral detections per session (high = too many dead ends)
